lead_paragraph: Phil Kessel had a hat trick and the United States scored three power-play goals in a 5-1 win over Slovenia in a preliminary round game at the world championships Sunday night in Halifax, Nova Scotia. Next up for the United States is a matchup Tuesday with Canada, which beat Latvia, 7-0. Both are 2-0, and the winner will get the top spot for Group B.
